bill_title: exempt certain purchases of material used in the  production of greenhouse, nursery, and ornamental plants from sales and use taxes.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to exempt certain purchases of material used in the production of greenhouse, nursery, and ornamental plants from sales and use taxes. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 10-45 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The purchase of any fertilizer, insecticides, pesticides, herbicides, growth regulators, fumigants, preservatives, soil, and plant shine that is directly used in the production of greenhouse, nursery, and ornamental plants intended to be sold ultimately at retail within or without the State of South Dakota is hereby specifically exempted from the tax imposed by chapter 10-45. Section 2. That chapter 10-46 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The use in this state of any fertilizer, insecticides, pesticides, herbicides, growth regulators, fumigants, preservatives, soil, and plant shine directly used in the production of greenhouse, nursery, and ornamental plants intended to be sold ultimately at retail within or without the State of South Dakota is hereby specifically exempted from the tax imposed by chapter 10-46. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to exempt certain purchases of material used in the production of greenhouse, nursery, and ornamental plants from sales and use taxes. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 10-45 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The purchase of any fertilizer, insecticides, pesticides, herbicides, growth regulators, fumigants, preservatives, soil, and plant shine that is directly used in the production of greenhouse, nursery, and ornamental plants intended to be sold ultimately at retail within or without the State of South Dakota is hereby specifically exempted from the tax imposed by chapter 10-45. This section only applies to a business primarily engaging in ornamental floricultural and nursery products (industry no. 0181) as enumerated in the Standard Industrial Classification Manual, 1987, as prepared by the Statistical Policy Division of the Office of Management and Budget, Office of the President. Section 2. That chapter 10-46 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The use in this state of any fertilizer, insecticides, pesticides, herbicides, growth regulators, fumigants, preservatives, soil, and plant shine directly used in the production of greenhouse, nursery, and ornamental plants intended to be sold ultimately at retail within or without the State of South Dakota is hereby specifically exempted from the tax imposed by chapter 10-46. This section only applies to a business primarily engaging in ornamental floricultural and nursery products (industry no. 0181) as enumerated in the Standard Industrial Classification Manual, 1987, as prepared by the Statistical Policy Division of the Office of Management and Budget, Office of the President.
